label:label.xlink:title: If T_20.03.a (row: 0050, column: 0220) equal 'TRUE' then field c0040 (System type) in T_30.00 should equal "CCP-Securities" or "CCP-Derivatives" and field c0030 (Critical function ID) in T_31.00 should equal "3.5 - Payment, Cash, Settlement, Clearing, Custody: CCP clearing services"
